item.title: [Delta] Donator points?
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

I added [code] if (MyShopID == 45) {
if (Dpoints >= TotPrice2) {
if (freeSlots() > 0){
Dpoints -= TotPrice2;
addItem(itemID, 1);
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
if ((fromSlot + 1)
> server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough space in your inventory.”);
break;
}
} else {

                    sM("Not enough Donator Points for this item.");
                }
        	}[/code] in my client.java but when I go buy an item from the donator shop, it takes coins, not points.

Read full topic
